snippet.title: SKALD: Against The Black Priory I Date Reveal Trailer - Coming to Steam and GOG May 30th
snippet.description:
Inspired by roleplaying games of yesteryear, combining modern design and compelling story with authentic 8-bit looks and charms, SKALD: Against the Black Priory is coming to Steam and GOG on May 30th!

Watch our brand new live action trailer and try out the NEW DEMO in the Steam Lovecraftian and Turn-Based Strategy Events running from April 4 - 8th. 

Wishlist now: https://shorturl.at/dfV05

Soundtrack - Romanus Surt

Live Action Trailer filmed by Naive
Website: naive.se
Instagram: @naive.society

Directed by:
Robin Jonsson, @robijons ( Instagram )
Oskar Gullstrand, @o.gullstrand (Instagram)
Cinematographer: Simon Rudholm, @simon.rudholm (Instagram)
Sounddesign: Jakob Oldenburg @oldenburgsound ( Instagram)
VFX: Oskar Gullstrand & Cecilia Azout
Edit: Robin Jonsson
